reviews.review: Very fun puzzle game. Innovative for time period
Esta Chido compralo ya llevo 52 horas y no me canso de jugarlo

Super gra zakupiłem ją na wyprzedaży razem z portalem 1 za 10zł i przeszedłem obie gry.
Tylko szkoda że jest bardzo krótka.
Deserves all the numerous merits you've already heard of. My issue with the game is that.. it doesn't have the third part. Gaben, brother, heed my call!
this is one of the best puzzle- story game I have ever played
Oyun aşırı zevkli ama biz iki beyinsiz hiç birşey beceremedik
Valla kaç yıllık oyun hala taş gibi mübarek

I played co-op with my friend for 4 hours yesterday, stayed up til' 1 am
Completely worth annihilating my sleep schedule.

I should have gotten this earlier.
Best game even in 2021
if you have deppression dont play this game
Its such a blast with friends
Buen gameplay, buena historia, buenos graficos y buen soundtrack.

Verdammt humorvolle Story und ko-op Nachstory
Die Rätsel fangen sehr Simpel an, haben ne gute Lernkurve und bedarfen auch mal die ein odere Probier und Knobelzeit

negatives gibt es kaum Ko-op ist einfach in der Steuerung und Atemberaubend in den Rätseln aber dennoch hätte ich gerne noch ne längere Story gewünscht mit neuen Testobjekten die es nur im Ko-op gibt (z.B. die Portalkanone die auf den markierten Ping schießt vom Anfang).

Story ist Perfekt es gibt wirklich nichts was daran schlecht ist der Humor ist sehr Gut und Die Rätsel sind entweder Knifflig oder machen einfach nur absolut Spaß.
Ахуевшая игра просто топчик я не знаю как это описать шедевр на 10/10
Gutes Spiel, besser als der erste Teil
Easily one of the best games ever made. Fantastic game that makes me wish Valve still made games consistently.
Güzel Bir oyun fakat multiplayer modunu bizmi çabuk bitirdik yoksa çok mu kısa anlayamadım. Güzel bir bulamaca oyunu
Perdez pas votre temps avec les évaluations et jouez à ce jeu pour vivre la meilleure expérience vidéoludique de toute votre vie
Wollte es schon seit ich auf Ps3 war aber war leider nur Xbox/Pc
Used 100% of my brain cells. I didn't know I was this smart

Matematik dersinde bile bu kadar zorlandığımı hatırlamıyorum. Önümde olan çıkışı bulabilmek için bir saat uğraştığımı bilirim.
coop kısmıda gayet eğlenceli ama konuşmadan yapmak imkansız yani demek istediğim şey hikayesi ve atmosferi ile çok güzel bir oyun coop bölümüde ayrı bir zevkli.
игра несложна и не лёгкая игра застовляет думать
Ну вообщем-то игра прикольная и одновременно сложная, советую поиграть с другом.
Лучшая игра! Давно мечтал в неё поиграть, видел много видео по ней. А тут она еще и по скидке! Во общем, рекомендую эту замечательную головоломку.
fun games, and an interesting plot!
i love throwing young children through portals
Amazing game. Good (sometimes thrilling)story and mechanics.100% must play
八个字，传送门2，永远嘀神
费脑子，买创意工坊送游戏
Super jeu, rien a dire mais je le recommande a tout le monde!!
打折的时候入的也给小伙伴入了一个，游戏模式也很有趣，传送传送给小伙伴传送没了，再也没看见他上过线，我是傻逼
Simplemente una obra maestra, uno de los mejores juego  que jamas han existido. por lo demas cuanta con una gran comunidad que hace de este juego un juego que sobrepasa las mil horas. Recomendadisimo
I don't care if I got betrayed by the little spherical idiot. GLAD0S is a potato and that's all that matters. 10/10

For any portal fan, this game is a must. And if you happen to have a friend to play with, the Co-Op course is amazing and fun for all ages! Don't be discouraged if you can't figure out a puzzle, it's meant to get harder and harder as the levels go on, and some of the community made maps make my brain hurt just thinking about them.

10/10 would get confused again.
игра отмосферная, для игры с другом пойдет
Still better than all the games that are coming out in the most recent years. Sad!
portal 1 and 2 are my favourite games ever! if you like puzzle games this is the one!
Es un juego buenisimo que a pesar de los años no envejece
Bão, só é irritante ter que fazer puzzle quando tu quer que a história continue de uma vez.

The saga continues! 

Much more deep, long, and flavorful gameplay than the first game. 

The only thing I hate about it is that when I bought it, I noticed that there were many plotholes that could only be solved if you beat Portal 1 so then I bought that game and it made sense.

If you buy this game, buy the first one and play it first. :)

for me personnaly, this is not reccomended and reccomended at the same time, its has its upsides and downsides, upsides is the storie`s are great and the graphics, the downsides, multiplayer doesnt have a microphone off switch so your stuck with bad sound quality and playing with your friends (playing with friends isnt a bad thing), also it sucks if you have deppression and your friends dont want to play the games u play
this game is one of the best ever it was and is amazing.

Play this game, there was a time where my smooth brain made me not like this game, then my dumbass finally realized this is a puzzle game and I had to think, then right after this became one of best games I have ever played
Awesome game, I suggest you try it,  PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE DO
